mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (USER_ID, PASSWD, USER_NM, GRP_CD ,ENTRY_DT, PHONENUM, GRADE_CD, USE_YN) VALUES(#{userId},#{passWd},#{userNm},#{grpCd}, #{entryDt},#{phoneNum},#{gradeCd}, #{useYn});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND PASSWD = #{password}
mapper.update: UPDATE USERS SET PASSWD = #{passWd} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_AUTH(USER_ID, AUTH_KEY, CRE_DT, EXP_DT) VALUES(#{userId},#{authKey},#{creDt},#{expDt})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM USER_AUTH WHERE USER_ID=#{email} AND EXP_DT = (SELECT MAX(EXP_DT) FROM USER_AUTH)
mapper.update: UPDATE USERS SET USE_YN = #{useYn} WHERE USER_ID = #{email}
mapper.select: SELECT USE_YN FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
